name: Hansuke Dating Simulator
description:
Hansuke Dating Simulator is a totally serious (not really), 100% interactive and unique dating simulator.

STORY MODE:
In this mode, you have to make Hansuke fall in love with you before he loses interest. You've got a lot of options and decisions that ewentually will lead you to one of the EIGHT ENDINGS.

SANDBOX MODE:
An infinite mode that unlocks when you finish the story mode and get a positive ending. It allows you to talk and hang out with you boyfriend forever
